title: AVC equals ATC when fixed costs are zero

content.question: Which of the following is true about a firm's average variable cost?

choices.label: It will rise if marginal cost is less than average variable cost.
It will never equal the firm's marginal cost.
It will decline when the firm's marginal product declines.
It will be negative if marginal revenue declines.
It will equal average total cost when fixed costs are zero.

content.answer: It will equal average total cost when fixed costs are zero.
